content: overtime hat designed by kira fee the overtime hat is a closet staple with clean lines it s great if you re a beginner knitter or the perfect palette cleanser between big projects it s named for the night i cast on at the start of my son s football game and finished during overtime just in time to celebrate their first win i almost always have one on the needles in my on the go bag and i tuck them into my family s coat pockets as i finish them it s perfect for using up leftover yarn- you can keep it classic or stripe it up with the colors for your favorite team make lemonade fiber co page 1 of 2025 kira fee project at a glance abbreviations yarn recommended yarn worsted weight 94 112 135 165 194 bor beginning of round yds/ 86 102 123 151 177 m cdd center double decrease- insert right needle knitwise into next two sts s to right needle k next stitch yarn used in sample pass the two slipped stitches over the knit stitch and woolfolk far off the needle decrease/ d decrease/decreased needles us 6 -
